tab1.text1:
Welcome to <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0.6,1">Matriark</> - a <RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">Community of Mature Survivors</>.

This is a stable, long-term 8 map cluster with crossplay-safe mods and plugins that enhance gameplay for Adult Players.

The founder, <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0.6,1">JustSimply_JJ</>, has hosted Ark maps since 2021 and self-hosts Matriark solo
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">- keeping the servers maintained, updated, and running smoothly</>.

Many of the players you’ll meet here have been part of this Community for a long time.

<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">On Matriark you can explore, build, and survive with like-minded adults who value respect, consideration, and zero toxicity.</>

<RichColor Color="1,0.3,0.7,1">We hope you enjoy your time with us.</>
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">────────────</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">HAPPY ARKING!</>

tab2.text1:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Respect the Community — don’t be an ass. On Matriark, kindness and consideration are key at all times.</>
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">────────────</>

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">1.</> Be a mature, respectful adult, no exceptions.
No toxicity, harassment, or drama in chat, Discord, or anywhere on the Cluster.

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">2.</> No inappropriate names and no "human" characters in game.
Applies to any language, final call is JJs.

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">3.</> No replacements or handouts.
Lost tames or items from normal gameplay or Wildcard bugs will not be replaced.

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">4.</> No repeated complaints.
Cluster chat is not tech support for Wildcard or Mod issues.

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">5.</> Be mindful where you build.
Do not build near others or close to public structures.
Base limits per map:
- A main base
- An outpost, public trap, or treehouse
- A water pen for raising and storing water tames

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">6.</> Breeding & wandering limits.
Do not leave tames on breed or wander.
Max 2 snails + 2 dung beetles (neutered).

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">7.</> No blocking.
Do not block major resources, explorer notes, artifact caves, or public-use areas.

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">8.</> Max 30 tames out while offline.
No tames on neutral, aggressive, or flee — no mess.

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">9.</> Turrets.
- Set to Wilds Only
- Medium or Low range
- Turret damage ×50
- ORP active

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">10.</> Structure pickup is ON.
Clean up after yourself. No spamming.

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">11.</> Cloning chambers.
Max 1 per tribe, per map.

<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">12.</> Choose Tribe members wisely.
Ongoing rule-breaks by members may result in your whole Tribe being wiped & banned.

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">13.</> Ocean Platform Limit.
Max of 4 large squares, or any mix of others equal to that size.
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">────────────</>

Don’t like my rules? No problem — best of luck finding a Cluster that fits your needs.

tab3.text2:
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Settings</>
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">────────────</>

- Wild Dino Max Level: 210
- Wyvern Max Level: 266
- Tek Creature Max Level: 252
- Harvesting: ×3
- Taming: ×10
- XP Gain: ×2
- Breeding: Accelerated
- Maturation: Balanced
- ORP: Active on all maps
- Structure Pickup: Enabled
- Cluster Transfers: Enabled
- Crossplay: Supported
